biocontainers.name: genometester
biocontainers.summary: Analyse whether pcr primers have excessive number of binding sites in large genomes, how many pcr products would be amplified in the reaction and where are they located.

biotools.summary: Analyse whether PCR primers have excessive number of binding sites in large genomes, how many PCR products would be amplified in the reaction and where are they located.

bioschemas.name: GenomeTester
bioschemas.summary: Analyse whether PCR primers have excessive number of binding sites in large genomes, how many PCR products would be amplified in the reaction and where are they located.
